original: @128a rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @128a rgya gar skad du /

original: dakshi n'i pa ri sho dh'a ni na ma /
analyzed: dakshi n'i pa ri sho dh'a ni na ma /

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /

original: yon yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba /
analyzed: yon yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba /

original: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened Buddha Samantaprabhāsa.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa blo gros dang ldan pa'i 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa blo gros dang ldan pa'i 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the bodhisattva mahāsattva endowed with great compassion, the youthful Mañjuśrī, the wise one.

original: na ma: sa manta pra bh'a r'a dz'a ya /
analyzed: na ma: sa manta pra bh'a r'a dz'a ya /

original: ta th'a ga t'a ya /
analyzed: ta th'a ga t'a ya /

original: aarha te / samyaksam buddha ya; na mo mnydzu shri ye /
analyzed: aarha te / samyaksam buddha ya; na mo mnydzu shri ye /

original: ku ma ra bhu t'a ya /
analyzed: ku ma ra bhu t'a ya /

original: bo dhi satv'a ya /
analyzed: bo dhi satv'a ya /

original: mah'a satv'a ya /
analyzed: mah'a satv'a ya /

original: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
analyzed: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /

original: tadya th'a / aom ni r'a la mbe ni r'a bha se dza ye dza ye la dhe /
analyzed: tadya th'a / aom ni r'a la mbe ni r'a bha se dza ye dza ye la dhe /
translated: Tadyathā: Oṃ niraṃbhe nirabhāse jayejaye laṃ dhe.

original: mah'a ma @128b te dakshe dakshe ni me ba ri sho dha ya sv'ah'a /
analyzed: mah'a ma @128b te dakshe dakshe ni me ba ri sho dha ya sv'ah'a /
translated: Mahāmaṃte dakṣiṇe ni me varṣa śodhaya svāhā.

original: 'di lan gcig brjod pas sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di lan gcig brjod pas sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By reciting this once, all misdeeds will be purified.

original: yon mang po la sbyad pa'ang byang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yon mang po la sbyad pa'ang byang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Even those who have used many offerings will be purified.

original: yon bdag de'i yon yongs su 'phel bar 'gyur zhing tshogs thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yon bdag de'i yon yongs su 'phel bar 'gyur zhing tshogs thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: The offerings of that benefactor will increase and all accumulations will be completed.🔽By reciting this, all obstacles will also not arise.

original: 'di brjod pas bar du gcod pa thams cad kyang mi 'byung ngo; ;'dul ba lung las /
analyzed: 'di brjod pas bar du gcod pa thams cad kyang mi 'byung ngo; ;'dul ba lung las /

original: rnam par nges pa'i mdo las byung ba yon yongs su sbyong pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: rnam par nges pa'i mdo las byung ba yon yongs su sbyong pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The dhāraṇī for purifying offerings that appears in the Sūtra of Ascertainment is complete.
